::Battera:;

She flew back down and looked at Vulois. "I don't have that 
capability.  I can not get that information from your memory 
banks..." she paused and looked down.  She had a thought, an idea 
that might work, but Cybershark would have to help.  She looked up at 
Vulois and then to Cybershark.  "There might be a way. But I don't 
know if it would work.  I could hook up a direct link to your stored 
memory and try to gain access, unlock it for you as it were. But it's 
only a theory that it will work. I've never done anything like it. 
just read about it once. It's a shot, a long shot, but a shot non the 
less."  She looked at Cybershark,"You'd have to monitor us and if 
there were any trouble, you'd have to disconnect us."

She didn't know of the risks, she had no clue as to waht she was 
really going to do, but she figured she had nothing to lose.
